In accordance with regulatory requirements of SEBI and as prescribed under applicable law, our Company will ensure that investors in India are informed of material developments, in relation to the statements and undertakings specifically confirmed and undertaken by our Company in the Red Herring Prospectus, from the date thereof until the time of the grant of listing and trading permission by the Stock Exchanges for the Offer. In accordance with the requirements of SEBI, each of the Selling Shareholders, severally and not jointly, shall ensure that our Company is informed of material developments in relation to the statements and undertakings specifically made or confirmed by such Selling Shareholder in relation to itself and its respective portion of the Offered Shares in the Red Herring Prospectus until the date of Allotment. Further, only statements and undertakings which are specifically confirmed or undertaken by the Selling Shareholders in this Draft Red Herring Prospectus shall be deemed to be statements and undertakings made by the Selling Shareholder, as of the date of this Draft Red Herring Prospectus.
